participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outdoorsy and adventurous, Jake loves to connect with nature and enjoys the thrill of live music.
participant_1.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i've two dogs.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about food, Ella has a zest for life and enjoys exploring both culinary and aquatic adventures.
participant_2.background: if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. spiderman is my favorite. l also love comic books.
